attributes.action: THINK AGAIN ABOUT ALLOWING GAYS TO ADOPT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that Gay rights are more important than our religious convictions. I believe that little children should have both mothers and fathers - this is natural. You don't find much homosexual behaviour in the natural world - some yes but in the human race we know much better through tradition and Christian teachings. This country is going to pot. Why let Gays have their freedom that now Christians havent got.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
